name: International Economics
descriptions: The economics department at TCU offers a wide variety of courses satisfying the diverse interests of our students and faculty members.

Reflecting our increasingly globalized world economy, we offer you the chance to learn about the economies of other countries with courses like Asian Economics. With additional offerings in International Trade and International Monetary Economics, we provide you with a valuable grasp of the interconnected nature of our global economy.

courses: INSC 20153 or MATH 10043 or MATH 30853 - 3 hrs.

internship.description: ECON 40990 - Economics Internship Prerequisites: Economics major, cum GPA of at least 3.0, completed a minimum of 12 hrs. in Economics, including either ECON 30223 or ECON 30233 with a grade of C- or better. Internship Coordinator Dr. Rosemarie Fike rosemarie.fike@tcu.edu
